articles.title: Toyota honoured with multiple 2026 AutoTrader Awards and voted Canada’s most trusted automaker
articles.description: TORONTO, February 13, 2026 – Toyota Canada’s commitment to offering Canadians a full range of stylish, well-engineered vehicles that represent excellent value for money has earned the company seven 2026 AutoTrader Awards. AutoTrader announced the awards as part of the events at the 2026 Canadian International Auto Show in Toronto.

articles.title: Toyota Canada recognized by Canadian Black Book with multiple 2026 Best Residual Value Awards, including both Overall Brand Awards
articles.description: TORONTO, February 12, 2026 - Toyota Canada has received eight Canadian Black Book (CBB) 2026 Best Residual Value Awards , including the Overall Brand awards in both the Car and SUV/Truck categories.

articles.title: Toyota Canada CEO outlines company’s approach to “unprecedented uncertainty”
articles.description: Cyril Dimitris addresses industry stakeholders ahead of Canadian International Auto Show

articles.title: Charged and Ready
articles.description: TORONTO, February 9, 2026 – Meet the all-new 2027 Highlander. Featuring sleek, modern lines, an electric powertrain, and a spacious three-row cabin with comfort for the whole crew.

articles.title: Toyota Canada ‘gets together’ with Dallas Green (City and Colour) to launch the Canadian-Built all-new, all-hybrid 2026 RAV4
articles.description: TORONTO, February 4, 2026 – Toyota Canada has just launched a new national campaign celebrating connection, recreation and the Canadian-built All-new, all-hybrid 2026 Toyota RAV4.
